channel.title: How do i change my server's ip from 0.0.0.0 ? Help me
channel.description:
Hello guys .I dont know how to change my server ip. because i have a server up and it makes me log into 0.0.0.0 and know 1 can get into it.I would like to change it.can i?
Another thing how do I make myself admin in my server i dont know how ?
Plz help me and ill make you a admin or co:)

item.title: How do i change my server's ip from 0.0.0.0 ? Help me
item.dc:creator: @abraham3 abraham3
item.description:
@abraham3 wrote:

in your source folder there is another folder that its called “characters” find your character then in player rights change the “0”

number “1” for mod
number “2” for admin
number “3” owner or co-owner depending on the source

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my server's ip from 0.0.0.0 ? Help me
